name: Rehearsal for subsistence within irreducible singularities
description:
gif made with digital collages of the performance ‘rehearsal for subsistence within irreducible singularities’ by Rafael da Escóssia and Taís Koshino, 2021. The perfomance was made in the context of the course Surface’s Methods from the Graduate Program in Visual Arts at the University of Brasília (PPGAV/UnB).
Watch the full perfomance: https://www.instagram.com/geomiticas/
